rules_text:
{2}{G}, {T}: Mill two cards, then create a tapped 1/1 white Citizen creature token.
{6}{G}{G}, {T}: Mill two cards, then create a tapped X/X colorless Construct artifact creature token, where X is the number of creature and/or enchantment cards in your graveyard.
notes:
!tokens colorless Construct XXERR;white Citizen 11ERR
